infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan passenger QR codes and take photos for incident reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to attach photos to incident reports.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to track trip routes and provide accurate ETAs.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location in the background to track trip routes even when the app is not in use.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Voyage Driver to access your camera to scan QR codes and take incident photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Voyage Driver to use your location to track trips.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Voyage Driver to use your location to track trips.
